You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Contact Fields

The Contact object is used with the Account object to represent an individual shopper. When not using person accounts, a contact and standard account together represent an individual shopper. When using person accounts, contacts aren’t used for individual shoppers. A business account buyer or shopper always has a contact and a standard account.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Contact object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Account Name	The name of the account the contact is assigned to.
Assistant	The name of the contact’s assistant.
Asst. Phone	The phone number of the contact’s assistant.
Birthdate	The birth date of the contact.
Contact Owner	The owner of the account the contact is assigned to.
Description	The description of the contact.
Do Not Call	Indicates that the contact doesn’t want to receive calls.
Email	The email address for the contact.
Email Opt Out	Indicates whether the contact has opted out of email (true) or not (false).
Fax	The fax number for the contact.
Fax Opt Out	Indicates whether the contact has opted out of receiving faxes (true) or not (false).
Home Phone	The home phone number for the contact.
Individual	The ID of the data privacy record associated with the contact.
Lead Source	The lead source for the contact.
Mailing Address	The mailing address for the contact.
Mobile	The mobile phone number for the contact.
Name	The name of the contact.
Other Address	The alternate address for the contact.
Other Phone	The alternate phone number for the contact.
Phone	The phone number for the contact.
Reports To	The name of the contact’s supervisor or manager.
Title	The title of the contact, such as CEO or Vice President.
